Package net.silthus.schat.util

Interface FilterableCollection<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the collection
All Superinterfaces:
Collection<T>, Iterable<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Messages, Targets
public interface FilterableCollection<T> extends Collection<T>
Marks the collection as filterable and adds the filter(Predicate) method.
Since:
next

  • Method Details

    • filter

      @NotNull default @NotNull @Unmodifiable List<T> filter(@NonNull @NonNull Predicate<T> filter)
      Filters the elements in the collection by the given predicate.

      This is the same as stream().filter(...) but without the overhead of streams.

      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate to filter for
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable filtered list
      Since:
      next

    • findFirst

      @NotNull default @NotNull Optional<T> findFirst(@NonNull @NonNull Predicate<T> filter)
      Tries to find an element matching the given filter and returns the first match.
      Parameters:
      filter - the filter used to search for the element
      Returns:
      the element if found
      Since:
      next
